annotations.description: The Japanese Cocktail was created by legendary barman (and great-godfather of the cocktail renaissance) Jerry Thomas in the 1860's. It was first published in...
annotations.title: Master The Cassics: Japanese Cocktail

textContent:
2.5oz (75ml) Cognac
.5oz (15ml) Orgeat
3 Dashes Angostura Bitters
Garnish Lemon Twist

Stir over ice, strain, and garnish with lemon twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ile399qAa1w
title: Japanese Cocktail
